briefTitle: Effect of Tamoxifen or an Aromatase Inhibitor on Estrogen Metabolism in Women Treated for Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effects of Therapeutic Agents on Estrogens in the Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of estrogen compounds in urine
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed ductal carcinoma in situ or invasive breast cancer
* Scheduled to receive tamoxifen citrate or an aromatase inhibitor
* Estrogen receptor or progesterone receptor positive
* ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not pregnant or nursing
* No prior antiestrogen drug such as tamoxifen citrate or raloxifene
* No concurrent estrogens
